item.title: CVE-2020-26807|2024-08-04T16:03:22.746Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20erp%20client%20for%20e-bilanz%201.0
item.description: SAP ERP Client for E-Bilanz, version - 1.0, installation sets Incorrect default filesystem permissions are set in its installation folder which allows anyone to modify the files in the folder.
